      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Obesity: balanced diets and treatment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Korpulenz: ausgewogene Diäten und 
Behandlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obésité : régimes équilibrés et 
traitement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Obesity: dietas equilibradas e tratamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Obesità: diete equilibrate e trattamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παχυσαρκία: ισορροπημένες διατροφές και 
επεξεργασία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Obesidad: dietas equilibradas y tratamiento</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">The incidence of obesity is on the increase in affluent societies, and the phenomenon commands increasing attention from health professionals, legislators and the media. This unit looks at the science behind obesity, examining the dietary, physiological and genetic aspects of the topic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Basal_metabolic_rate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Body_mass_index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Child_obesity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Diet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Environment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Evolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Exercise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Genes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Genotype</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Metabolism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Nutrients</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Obesity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Ausdehnung von Korpulenz ist auf der Zunahme 
der reichlichen Gesellschaften und den Phänomenbefehlen, die 
Aufmerksamkeit von den medizinischen Fachkräften, von den 
Gesetzgebern und von den Media erhöhen. Diese Maßeinheit 
betrachtet die Wissenschaft hinter der Korpulenz und überprüft die 
diätetischen, physiologischen und genetischen Aspekte des Themas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'incidence de l'obésité est en augmentation des
sociétés riches, et les commandes de phénomène augmentant 
l'attention des professionnels de santé, des législateurs et des 
medias. Cette unité regarde la science derrière l'obésité, 
examinant les aspects diététiques, physiologiques et génétiques du
sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A incidência do obesity está no aumento em 
sociedades afluentes, e nos comandos do fenômeno que aumentam a 
atenção dos profissionais de saúde, dos legislators e dos media. 
Esta unidade olha a ciência atrás do obesity, examinando os 
aspectos dietéticos, physiological e genetic do tópico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'incidenza dell'obesità è in aumento nelle 
società ricche ed i comandi di fenomeno che aumentano l'attenzione 
dai professionisti del settore medico-sanitario, dai legislatori e dai
media. Questa unità guarda la scienza dietro l'obesità, 
esaminante le funzioni dietetiche, fisiologiche e genetiche del 
soggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίπτωση της παχυσαρκίας αυξάνεται στις εύπορες 
κοινωνίες, και το φαινόμενο διατάζει την αυξανόμενη προσοχή από 
τους προσφέροντες ιατρικές υπηρεσίες, τους νομοθέτες και τα μέσα.
Αυτή η μονάδα εξετάζει την επιστήμη πίσω από την 
παχυσαρκία, που εξετάζει τις διαιτητικές, φυσιολογικές και 
γενετικές πτυχές του θέματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La incidencia de la obesidad está en el aumento 
en sociedades afluentes, y los comandos del fenómeno que aumentan la 
atención de profesionales de salud, de legisladores y de los media. 
Esta unidad mira la ciencia detrás de la obesidad, examinando 
los aspectos dietéticos, fisiológicos y genéticos del asunto.</string>
          </description>
